ARABIC: مَآ أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَا فَأْتِ بِـَٔايَةٍ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: You are nothing but a human being like ourselves, so produce a Sign if you are telling the truth.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: You are nothing but a man like us. Bring us a token if you speak the truth."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: you are no different from a mortal like us. So produce a sign if you are truthful."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: You are a mere mortal like us. Show us a miracle if you are telling the Truth".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “You are just a human like us; therefore bring some sign if you are truthful.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: You are but a human being like us. Then bring us a sign if you are of the truthful."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: You are naught but a mortal like ourselves; so bring a sign if you are one of the truthful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: thou art naught but a mortal, like us; then produce a sign, if thou art one of the truthful.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Thou art but a mortal like us. So bring some token if thou art of the truthful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: You are only a human being like ourselves. Show us a sign, if you are telling the truth."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Thou art but a human being like unto us. So bring thou a sign if thou art of the truth-tellers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: You are just a human being like us. So bring us a sign, should you be truthful.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Thou art no more than a mortal like us: then bring us a Sign, if thou tellest the truth!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: You are but a human being like us. Then bring us a sign if you are of the truthful."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: You are but a human like ourselves. Produce for us a sign, if you are of the truthful'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: You are nothing but a man like us. So bring us a sign, if you are truthful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: You are but a man like ourselves, so bring a sign, if you should be of the truthful."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:154] And, moreover, you are just a human being like us. So bring [us] a sign, if you are sincere’, in your Mission.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Thou art but a mortal) a human being (like us) you eat and drink just like we do. (So bring some token) a sign to prove what you claim (if thou art of the truthful) that the punishment is coming and that you are a Messenger to us.
